text:
Shahla Safi Zamir (, 1948 – 6 June 2020), better known by her stage name Marjan (), was an Iranian singer and actress. Her career lasted from 1969 to 2012. She was born in Shiraz, Iran. Her best known roles were in "Morgh-e tokhm-tala", "Salam Bar Eshgh" and "Takye bar baad".
Marjan died on 6 June 2020, aged 72.
She died due to a cardiac arrest. She spent the last years of her life in Los Angeles.
